name: copymoveto
title: CopyMoveTo
description: Save time moving files between folders. Define destinations once, use quick commands to copy or move files effortlessly
author: Mehdi_Hp

commands.name: add-new-destination
commands.title: Add New Destination
commands.description: Create a new destination for copying or moving files

commands.name: copy-to
commands.title: Copy To...
commands.description: Copy the selected files to a destination

commands.name: move-to
commands.title: Move To...
commands.description: Move the selected files to a destination

preferences.name: fileConflictAction
preferences.title: What to do if file already exists?
preferences.description: Action to take when a file with same name exists in destination

preferences.name: showPath
preferences.label: Show Path
preferences.title: Show destination's full path in the list
preferences.description: Show the full path of the destination in the list

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
